title: The Children in the Grey Room | S1E6
description:
Kira’s experience at Vasquez Rocks and a lead to an occult expert bring the girls closer than ever to uncovering the truth. This following episode contains violence and graphic language.
~~
From QCODE, makers of fantastic audio fiction. Visit QCODEMedia.com to learn more. And, check out some of our other shows including: The Left Right Game with Tessa Thompson, Borrasca with Cole Sprouse, Blackout with Rami Malek, Soft Voice with Naomi Scott. 

Listen to this episode uninterrupted (without ads in the middle) with QCODE+ on Apple Podcasts. QCODE+ subscribers also enjoy special bonus episodes which include conversations with the creators of the show. For more information visit QCODE+
